title: As we move onto the fourth generation of tanks, what are the new vehicles that are coming out, and what features will they have that distinguish and improve them from the past generation? - Quora

response.answer_text: A clear trend is larger caliber guns and autoloaders Improved modular armor packages and advanced hunter/killer gunnery suites. Active defence shielding is a buzz word too they probably are going to beef up engine power too.
